query:
WITH updated_note AS (
                UPDATE paper_note
                SET note = $2, note_timestamp = $3
                WHERE paper_note_id = $1
                RETURNING paper_note_id, note, note_timestamp
            )
            SELECT 
                n.paper_note_id,
                n.note,
                n.note_timestamp,
                r.paper_id
            FROM updated_note n
            INNER JOIN paper_note_relation r ON n.paper_note_id = r.paper_note_id
